channel.title: FLASH EP - Helixx [multi genre but mostly electro house]
channel.description:
My first official ep is finally out https://soundcloud.com/dubby-dubstep-1/sets/flash-ep
Spider https://soundcloud.com/dubby-dubstep-1/spider
Dopamine https://soundcloud.com/dubby-dubstep-1/dopamine
Slug https://soundcloud.com/dubby-dubstep-1/slug
Showdown https://soundcloud.com/dubby-dubstep-1/showdown
Also what shocked you the most about this ep? What shocked me is that I finished it in a week.

item.title: FLASH EP - Helixx [multi genre but mostly electro house]
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Yeah I agree with dopamine. Nice catchy chords. Brbyeah too much sweeper. Good job @HELIXX

Read full topic

item.title: FLASH EP - Helixx [multi genre but mostly electro house]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I like the ideas in Dopamine, it’s got a good flow. Across the board yeah, too much sweeper

I have a feeling Dopamine gonna be stuck in my head there’s something about it, the main loop structure. I like it!

Read full topic
item.source: FLASH EP - Helixx [multi genre but mostly electro house]

item.title: FLASH EP - Helixx [multi genre but mostly electro house]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
I think Showdown was the strongest, most original sound. If you ever release another EP, I’d slow down on using the sweeper in every track. It was the most repetitive element and while individually, it may sound fine, an EP should compliment each other rather than compete for the best use of a sound.

Read full topic
